title: Installation will fail on case-insensitive filesystems

content.raw:
This package installs `sdf/sdf.hh` and `sdf/SDF.hh` in the include folders. This will not be possible on filesystems that are not case-sensitive. Note that this includes Mac OS X, which by default uses a case-preserving but not case-sensitive filesystem.

Note that this was not an issue when the sdf code was in gazebo because `SDF.hh` was installed to `sdf/interface/SDF.hh`.
